name: Fum-Kun X Fruits
description:
Fum-Kun X Fruits is a game I made for Fumiya of Fumishun Base. For some reason, Fumiya doesn't like fruits, and I find it interesting cause he would still try fruits given by his fans. So I made a game base on his dislike towards fruits.

Fumiya's Youtube Channel
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCi7Ofw4sJynsacr_i6uk_lA
